abstracts.cdata!:
The Government of Senegal has maintained
            a satisfactory macroeconomic framework, as agreed with the
            Bank and the IMF. This has been confirmed by the recent
            Country Assistance Strategy (CAS) preparation. Further, the
            Bank is satisfied with the progress achieved and maintained
            by the program. The first tranche was disbursed upon
            effectiveness on January 12, 2005. The conditions of release
            of the floating tranche related to the Tax Reform Plan were
            met and this tranche was released September 27, 2005. In
            view o f the overall progress with the implementation of the
            Postal Sector Reform Program supported by the Credit and in
            compliance with the specific conditions of release described
            in Section IV, para 19 items 1-3, the Association has
            informed the Borrower of the availability of the Postal
            Services Reform floating tranche in the amount of SDR 6 million.
